dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S470 IS: To amend title 10, United States Code, to require that the Purple Heart occupy a position of precedence above the new Distinguished Warfare Medal.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Tester (for himself, Mr. Heller, Mr. Boozman, Mr. Manchin, and Mr. Baucus) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to require that the Purple Heart occupy a position of precedence above the new Distinguished Warfare Medal.

section.header: Precedence of award of Purple Heart compared to award of Distinguished Warfare Medal
section.text: Section 1127 of title 10, United States Code, is amended by striking displayed, not lower than that immediately following the bronze star. and inserting the following:

paragraph.text: not lower than the position immediately following the position of the bronze star; and
above the position of the Distinguished Warfare Medal.
